qas.question: During what period did the Tower Theatre re-open?
After its re-opening, which types of movies did the Tower Theatre show?

answers.text: second and third run movies, along with classic films

qas.question: In what year did Roger Rocka's Dinner Theater & Good Company Players open?
Which two leading roles did Audra McDonald perform when she was in high school?
When was the Tower Theater closed?

plausible_answers.text: second and third run movies, along with classic films

qas.question: What did Roger Rocka's Dinner Theater & Good Company Players show?
What year did Audra McDonald perform the roles of Evita and The Wiz?
What type of award did Roger Rocka win?

context: This vibrant and culturally diverse area of retail businesses and residences experienced a renewal after a significant decline in <b5_0>the late 1960s<b5_0/> and 1970s.[citation needed] After decades of neglect and suburban flight, the neighborhood revival followed the re-opening of the Tower Theatre in the <a0_0><a0_1><a0_2>late 1970s<a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/>, which at that time showed <a1_0><a1_1><a1_2><b6_0>second and third run<a1_2/> movies<a1_1/>, along with classic films<b6_0/><a1_0/>. <b9_0>Roger Rocka<b9_0/>'s Dinner Theater & Good Company Players also opened nearby in <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2><b7_0>1978<b7_0/><a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/>,[citation needed] at Olive and Wishon Avenues. <a3_0><a3_1><a3_2>Fresno<a3_2/><a3_1/><a3_0/> native Audra McDonald performed in the leading roles of <a4_0><a4_1><a4_2>Evita and The Wiz<a4_2/><a4_1/><a4_0/> at the theater while she was a high school student. McDonald subsequently became a leading performer on Broadway in New York City and a <b8_0>Tony<b8_0/> award winning actress. Also in the Tower District is Good Company Players' 2nd Space Theatre.
